datoCmsKey.name: Delia Kropp
datoCmsKey.bio:
Transgender actress & director, working professionally in theatre, film and related media since 1976. Experienced advocate for my community, currently seeking consulting, public speaking, and training opportunities, re-imagining my live presentations for online delivery. 
Artistic Associate and Artist Rep to the Board of About Face Theatre, Chicago's longest-lived LGBT company. Winner of their 2018 Leppen Leadersip Award for service to the LGBT community.
